posts.post_title: FS 6 Different T206 Red Cobbs - All Different Backs
posts.post_content:
Selling the below 6 different Red Cobbs. Please PM me or email me if you are interested in any:

  * T206 Red Cobb Sweet Caporal 460 Fact 25 PSA 2.5  $5400. SOLD
  * T206 Red Cobb Tolstoi SGC 1.5   $5500
  * T206 Red Cobb Old Mill PSA 2 $5200
  * T206 Red Cobb Piedmont 460 Factory 42 SGC 3.5  $8000
  * T206 Red Cobb Tolstoi SGC 3.5  $11,500
  * T206 Red Cobb Polar Bear SGC 1.5  $3300
